sentence.text: In response to surgical induction of endometriosis, regulation of transcription involved in G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle-/- female mice develop significant fibrosis in contrast to wild-type mice.

entity.text: regulation of transcription involved in G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle

sentence.text: Recent studies indicate that such scarring has a high female propensity; females are also almost exclusively affected by endometriosis, a common multicellular organism development steroid-dependent fibrotic disease.
